awards.text: Nominated for 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 2 wins & 3 nominations.

fullplot: An intimate portrait of poet, painter, musician and singer Patti Smith that mirrors the essence of the artist herself.
plot: An intimate portrait of poet, painter, musician and singer Patti Smith that mirrors the essence of the artist herself.
title: Patti Smith: Dream of Life

tomatoes.consensus: Elegiac and personal, Patti Smith: Dream of Life paints an enduring and sometimes rough portrait of the titular chanteuse, complete with footage onstage and at home.
